reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Food and Nutrition Assistance to the Republic of Yemen (IMDAD)

description.narrative: Purchase and distribution of food products from wheat grains, vegetable oils and pulses for general food distribution. Purchase and distribution of dietary supplements. Distribution and supervision of the system of food vouchers to beneficiaries
